name: GS Saga ~ Fighter Machine
description:
GS Saga : Fighter Machine

Cross-over between the real world and RPG world (isekai).

This is the journey of a boy with Mecha and Gamestation characters to fight side by side to save the world from destruction.

Disclaimer

This game is free to play, all assets are belong to their own respective owners. Gamestation characters are based on real-world Gamestation Magazine.

Original Release

This is the original release from 2004 version (RPG Maker 2K), apologize for the words in scripts might be quite dated to play now. 

Language: Indonesia
